title: PAYDAY 2: Crude Awakening Bundle
description: The Crude Awakening Bundle is the thrilling conclusion to the Texas Heat saga. The bundle contains 4 content packed DLCs at a heavily reduced price.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The Crude Awakening Bundle**
The Crude Awakening Bundle is the final chapter in the Texas Heat saga. We’ve been all around Texas, robbing our way through ranches, rail yards and research facilities, spreading fear and chaos across Texas. Now, it’s time for the riveting finalé.

**Lawless Tailor Pack**
PAYDAY 2 has a lot of revolvers and a lot of outfits, but it isn’t until now that you’ve truly been able to embody the spirit of our bankrobber ancestors. This Tailor Pack contains 4 outfit sets complete with suit, mask and gloves giving you the tools you need to heist in the way grand-pappy would’ve wanted.

The Lawless Tailor Pack contains the following:
**Suits**
- Wild Bunch
- Train Robber
- Jailbreaker
- Bushwhacker

**Masks**
- Butch
- Sam
- Billy
- Jesse

**Gloves**
- Gambler
- Cowpuncher
- Call Spades
- Easy Rider

**McShay Weapon Pack 4**
Gemma McShay has delivered time and time again, this latest Weapon Pack is no different. In this pack we’re getting 3 brand new weapons, each bringing their own unique thing, mods and Exclusive Set.
- The Deimos shotgun is a highly versatile option for any shotgun enthusiast, the Deimos allows you to choose between a high-power pump action setting and a high rate of fire automatic setting.
- The Deimos comes with 9 unique weapon mods, and an Exclusive Set.
- The Amaroq 900 is a high-power sniper rifle excelling at long range, modeled after one of the most famous sniper rifles in all of gaming.
Sure to make you a terror of the battlefield, the Amaroq 900 comes with 12 unique mods, 1 mod compatible with other sniper rifles and 2 Exclusive Sets.
- The Campbell 74 LMG is capable of putting a lot of fire down range, literally and figuratively! Not only does it have a tremendous rate of fire, but also comes with an actual underbarrel flamethrower!
- The Campbell 74 comes with 7 unique mods and an Exclusive Set

**Chinatown Music Pack**
The Chinatown Music Pack picks up where we left off last time and includes a number of great songs from the City of Gold, Texas Heat campaigns and beyond. So relax, put on your headphones and enjoy the sounds of PAYDAY. Any additional music from the last Texas Heat heist will be added to this collection as it’s released.
The full list of songs included is as follows:
- Gold Rush (Dragon Heist - City of Gold)
- Dark Light Strike (Ukrainian Prisoner Heist - City of Gold)
- Payback Roulette (Black Cat Heist - City of Gold)
- Showdown Inferno (Mountain Master - City of Gold)
- City of Gold
- Trailblazers (Midland Ranch Heist - Texas Heat)
- Trainwreck (Lost In Transit Heist - Texas Heat)
- Backlash Ink (Hostile Takeover Heist - Texas Heat)
- Sly Gloves (Christmas 2019)
- Blast Our Way Out (Christmas 2019)
- Propulsive Force (Christmas 2019)
- PAYDAY Royale (April Fools 2019)
- Heist song for Crude Awakening Heist
- Texas Heat Campaign Song

**Crude Awakening Heist**
Alice Rainey is on the run, she’s currently hiding out at one of her business enterprises in the Gulf of Mexico. And like many have been made to learn before her, one does not simply hide from the Payday gang.
The Crude Awakening heist is the conclusion of the Texas Heat story, let’s wrap this up heisters!
